roleset.name: project a shadow or contour against a background

role.descr: background against which the silhouette is seen

example.name: Passive with agent
example.text: The last I saw as I laid my head upon soft cushions on a down pallet was Joscelin silhouetted by lamplight

example.name: Passive with background
example.text: He was standing now with his heavy chin silhouetted against the flickering light of the candle on the table .

propbank.arg: against the flickering light of the candle on the table

roleset.note: SILHOUETTE-V NOTES: Roleset added by Julia based on example in Brown corpus. No Vncls. (from silhouette.01-v)
Sometimes the lightsource can be the background-- pay attention to the syntax to distinguish Arg-0 from Arg-2 (from silhouette.01-v)
